nl.weeaboo.vn.core

Class Duration

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.weeaboo.vn.core.Duration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Duration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An amount of time. We can't use java.time.Duration because it's not available on older versions of Android.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • fromDuration

        public static Duration fromDuration(long duration,
                                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Creates a new duration object.
        Parameters:
        unit - Duration only stores millisecond precision. To prevent unintended precision loss, the TimeUnit.MICROSECONDS and TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS units are not accepted by this method.

      • toSeconds

        public long toSeconds()
        Returns:
        The duration in seconds, rounded down.

      • toMillis

        Returns:
        The duration in milliseconds.
